lender.name: ASL KIVA Youth Group
lender.occupation: Students at The American School in London (ASL)
lender.loan_because:
Club Goals: 1. Instilling the values of philanthropy in our ASL community.
2. Making people at ASL aware of the situation facing the poor.
3. Making students aware of the benefits of recycling their cell phones.
4. Making our citizens aware that a little money can go a long way - and that their capital is not lost, but is reused in making many poor people's lives better.
Club Aims: The MicroFinance Club aims to help ASL make its contribution to those in need overseas, through microfinance. In order to raise funds, we aim to organize a cell phone recycling drive sometime around the holiday season (a time when people might be getting new phones and wondering what to do with their old ones). The cell phones collected from this drive will go to an organization called EnviroCharities, which recycles the cell phones into eco-friendly waste or reusable parts for use in building new technology worldwide. EnviroCharities then sends us payment to the value of the number of cell phones recycled (the prices vary depending on the phone). We will then contribute the raised money to Kiva, a registered microfinance organization. We can choose whom we want to contribute any part of the funds to - there are people looking for funding to start a business all over the world, from South America to Asia. Once we have contributed to the recipient, we can then keep track of the progress they are making towards a better lifestyle, including knowing how much of the loan we gave is being repaid. The outcome is truly amazing and incredibly life-changing - for both the donor and the recipient.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students at The American School in London dedicated to creating change by financially assisting those in need worldwide.

lender.loan_because: Following the Jewish practice of tzedakah, I give a portion of my income to various charities and causes, and Kiva is now a fun and engaging part of my donation rotation. I am for peace and freedom for Palestinians and Israelis.
